texts:
2025-11-24 [toilet] This was here first poop of the day
It was a bit smooth poop

2025-11-24 [walk] It was sunny outside 
my father went around the university near the house

2025-11-24 [custom] She could sleep by herself: Today nobody of our family slept next to the dog. Although she made a little bit of a sound because she wanted to do a pee and it waked my  mother up.
She did not bark but she just made a sound with her pow. Such a nice girl!!!

2025-11-25 [custom] Run away: She somehow figured out how to get out of the cage, and when my mom went and see her, she was already outside of the cage. 
We securely locked the cage afterwards
2025-11-25 [toilet] We let her out of the cage and walked her around the house. She suddenly started peeing on the floor and made a mess on the floor.
2025-11-25 [walk] They went to the place near the house. The dog still cannot walk by itself.

2025-11-25 [sleep] She got tired of playing with her mom and She fell asleep. 
She sometimes snors
2025-11-25 [play] I cuddle her and she tried to lick me
2025-11-25 [walk] Since outside was rainy, we walked her in the house. She got so excited to see new things in the house. The distance is empty because we did not go outside
